Camden.Congregation Shivtei Yeshuron-Ezras Isra: Congregation Shivtei Yeshuron-Ezras Israel (קאנגרעגיישאן שבטי ישורון עזרת ישראל) is an active synagogue located in the Pennsport neighborhood of South Philadelphia. Shivtei Yeshuron moved to its current location in 1909 and had purchased the building by 1917. It is South Philadelphia's oldest continuously active synagogue building and congregation.
